p: Boldo leaves (1 kg) were coarsely crushed, then inserted into a 10 L flask and 6 L of deionized water was added. Afterwards, the Clevenger-type apparatus was inserted at flaskâ€™s neck and hydrodistillation has begun. After 3 h a yellowish oil was collected and stored in dark vials sealed with PTFE-silicon caps (Sigma-Aldrich, Milan, Italy). The oil yield was determined on a dry weight basis; it was 1.8%.
